author: phabc
content: If there is a deep re-org where the BASEFEE is adjusted significantly, are all txs in the re-org repriced, fee wise?

author: phabc
content: Wondering of potential cascading effects. I guess most txs would just not be executable if, say, basefee was priced upward too much

author: lightclient
content: <@!278762485497069569> by repriced, you mean the amount they pay out is adjusted?

author: phabc
content: Forgot if the fee specified by client is the final fee or the max fee

author: lightclient
content: Got it, yeah ethereum txs would scale up to pay the basefee (if they can still afford it)

author: phabc
content: Because if it's the max fee then there is room for it to increase if re-orged

author: lightclient
content: Txs specify the max amount theyâ€™re willing to pay and the tip is calculated dynamically
